transcript: So after we sort of went to dinner and I was already tired, I wasn't all that excited. And so he's like, let's go to the beach and I was like, no, I don't want to go to the beach. Like, I'm tired. And he's like, no, no, we have to go. And I was like, okay, that's a little weird.

segments.text: So after we sort of went to dinner and I was already tired, I wasn't all that excited.
And so he's like, let's go to the beach and I was like, no, I don't want to go to the beach.
And he's like, no, no, we have to go.
And I was like, okay, that's a little weird.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: So after we sort of went out dinner and I was already like tired.  I wasn't all that excited and and so he's like let's go down to the beach and I was like no I don't want to the beach, like I'm tired. And he's like no, no we have to go.  And I was like okay, like that's a little weird.
